question: You have seen an advertisement in an Australia magazine for someone to live with a family for six months and look after their six-year-old child.Write a letter to the parents. In your letter-explain why you would like the job Give details of why you would be a suitable person to employ Say how you would spend your free time while you are in Australia
text: I hope you are well and I would like to inform you all about a weekly magazine that I read  last week in Australia. It was an advertisement for a vacancy to look after a six-year-old child and I am interested to apply for this job.

To be more precise, there are many reasons why I would like to choose this job. Firstly, I don’t need to worry about my accommodation fees as I am allowed to stay with them for six months. Moreover, I have a passion for caring for children and even I could look after  my younger sisters when I was in child. Taking care of children is not difficult for me because I was used to being babysat since I was in childhood and I know how to treat a child and be patient.

Therefore, as above mentioned, I am of the view that this role suits me to live and work in Australia. Besides, I can get two days off  every weekend and learn both sewings which is one of my passion and French on my holidays to increase my skills while I am  here.
